name: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Learn fundamental algorithms and problem-solving techniques. This course covers a wide range of algorithms and data structures, equipping you with the knowledge and skills to tackle complex computational problems.

name: Data Structure
description: Explore data structures and their applications in programming. This course delves into various data structures such as arrays, linked lists, trees, and graphs, along with practical implementation in coding.

name: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Introduction to object-oriented programming using Python. Discover the principles of OOP and how to apply them in Python, enabling you to write efficient and modular code.

name: Software Engineering
description: Discover software development methodologies and best practices. This comprehensive course covers the software development lifecycle, agile methodologies, and industry-standard tools.

name: AWS Cloud Computing
description: Learn cloud computing using Amazon Web Services (AWS). Explore cloud services, deployment strategies, and how to build scalable and reliable applications on the AWS platform.

name: Database (MySQL)
description: Explore database management with MySQL. This course covers database design, SQL queries, and practical hands-on experience with MySQL database systems.

name: Problem-Solving
description: Enhance your problem-solving skills and critical thinking. Develop your ability to approach complex problems systematically, analyze them, and find effective solutions.

name: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Introduction to C++ for data structures and algorithms. This course provides an in-depth understanding of C++ programming for implementing data structures and algorithms.

name: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of C programming language. This course covers C syntax, data types, and programming techniques, making it ideal for beginners in programming.
